Name: Battle Ball
About the game: Battle Ball is a goofy multiplayer game about dodgeball, with more explosions and fewer rules. The goal in Battle Ball is to knock as many opponents out as you can in under 3 minutes. Team up with friends or join random players! Don't have any friends? No problem! With version 1.1 Battle Ball now has a single-player mode where you can battle bots. Express Yourself Earn Dodgebucks by playing in matches to spice up your look with crazy hats and outfits About the Dev Dad Hat Games is an independent studio, currently consisting of one member, who is passionate about creating fun experiences and looking forward to creating more projects
Meta Title: Battle Ball: Mar 12, 2021, Dad Hat Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Battle Ball? Check out the release date (Mar 12, 2021), developer insights from Dad Hat Games, and a complete game summary.
